website_summaries.verdict: Despite its lightweight fabric, this cover holds up well even in stormy weather.
pros: An affordable option that also offers great protection from wind, water, and sun
Shiny coating also serves to keep cars cool in hot weather
Comes in 10 sizes and styles for sedans, hatchbacks, and SUVs
cons: The thin material tears easily and may not last more than six months in hot or windy areas

customer_reviews.title: I'm really pleased with the cover
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with the cover. It's light weight and is not bulky and easy to put on and take off. The orange markings at the head and tail lights and on the mirrors are great because they let you know how to orient the cover on your car. Very smart! It's not 100% waterproof but does a darn good job. I purchased it to keep sap off the car and it works perfectly for that. I recommend and would buy again. - Oh, there's elastic around the bottom front and back which keeps it on snuggly along with "ties" that help in windy conditions. Haven't used those yet. The elastic so far has held it in place.
customer_reviews.author: AKOS

customer_reviews.title: Amazon said it wouldn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 Nissan Maxima and Amazon said Jayme covers would NOT fit my car. I emailed the seller, told them what I had and they recommended the C9. They were spot on. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: OKCity

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: 2016 Z51 Convertible Stingray cover did not fit and rubbed badly on the under inner portion of the mirrors.
customer_reviews.author: Chetman Sputgeon

customer_reviews.title: Beware!Do not buy!Removed paint and scratched car!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! Removed paint and ruined the look of the car! I thought it was good when we bought it, stayed down but when we took it off the junk material was like sandpaper and scratched and removed the paint. Would have been MUCH better to have had car exposed to the winter weather. Beware, do not buy! Do not want to give it any stars but Amazon must give at least 1.
customer_reviews.author: MGNRN02

customer_reviews.title: Ok car cover but customer service is poor
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months in the car cover tore. Customer service only offered me 15% off a new order. It was a song and dance. The material seems to be water proof, but less then a year and its becoming brittle. The customer service rep suggested the one with the fabric liner because its more durable. It would be an ok cover in a garage but outside you will be lucky if you get a year out of it. Spring for the 5 or 7 layer one but you will probably have the same problem...
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable car cover for the pandemic.
customer_reviews.text: With us all sheltering in place, I have only used my Sebring 3 or 4 times in 4 months. It has just been parked in my carport during that time. My carport is open on the front and back so the Sebring got filthy covered with dust. I had to have it smog tested for my registration. I also had to have the oil changed and a new battery. After washing the car, I bought this car cover to keep it clean. I was able to get the correct size as my Sebring is very long. The cover also comes with a storage bag. A good cover at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lasted 7 months then ripped down middle from winds
customer_reviews.text: Nice and waterproof. No soft liner inside but seems ok. Giving 3 stars because front tie down clip does not clip and needs to be tied. Update: got my replacement cover real fast and all is good. Update 10/20/2019: I live in Sacramento and cover lasted through summer but once fall winds came, cover split in half and was very brittle from the summer sun.
customer_reviews.author: HIEU

customer_reviews.title: Totally Crushed - Absolute Must Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I should have open and inspect the package when it arrived instead of waiting until I was ready to use it. Well, I just opened the package and as seen in the image I had not even unraveled the product for use. The plastic lock was so brittle that it was crushed by the shrink wrap process. As brittle as it is, I don't see it standing up to the force of nature. Sitting out in the sun, it would become more brittle. Why didn't they use rubber for the locking mechanism? There's no quality control. It would take a second to lock it before shrinking. I can't comment on fitment or any particular.
customer_reviews.author: Digitrash

customer_reviews.title: Poor value
customer_reviews.text: Pros: (1) It protected my car from the elements for two winter seasons and part of the summer. (2) Zippered door entry is handy Cons: (1) Does not stay put in the wind. The first one I bought ended up in a tree after a storm. I bought a second one and secured it with a large bungee cord that I wrapped around the outside of the cover and car. (2) Does not last more than a season or two before falling apart at the seams. (3) A poor value for the money. Over-priced given the modest quality. I'll probably look for a better cover for next season.
customer_reviews.author: Lapu-Lapu

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to use in the wind
customer_reviews.text: I live in an area that is constantly very windy, thus dusty. So I wanted a car cover so my car doesn’t get dirty all the time. However it is absolutely IMPOSSIBLE to install this car cover while it is windy. I don’t know if there’s a different way the car cover could have been designed to prevent this or maybe it could come with some sort of weights to attach to it. But it didn’t come with and instructions and it doesn’t tell you which side is front and which is back until you have it completely open and figure it out based on the side mirror covers location.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Harjehausen

customer_reviews.title: I liked how quickly it was delivered
customer_reviews.text: I liked how quickly it was delivered. However, I tried to fasten the the clasps but they didn't fit. I had to tie them together. When it snowed the next day it blow off my car!!! I'll NEVER buy from Kayme again
customer_reviews.author: faithe

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate Kayme reaching out to me about a car cover that ripped after a short period of use. They sent me a new cover within a few days and this one feels more durable than the last. I love the reflectors on the cover too, just in case you have to park on the curb. It’s fits my 2008 BMW 5 series perfectly. Oh and yes, it keeps the dirt and water away quite nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Buster

customer_reviews.title: barely used and lasted less than 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I always had it stored in my trunk. It had been used maybe 6 times. I recently went to take it out of the bag after being stored away for about 6 months. It literally shredded. The bag however was in great shape. Don't waste your money. Trying to get to the website ( as Amazon suggested) is a waste of time. No way to contact customer service and since it's warrantied for only one year, you can just kiss your dollars goodbye
customer_reviews.author: Joe Miceli

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2017 ford fusion and this cover fits it perfectly, however I live in Denver so I'll let everyone know how it handles snow after the winter.
customer_reviews.author: john hoehle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my car looking nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits over my 13 foot MR2 Spyder. Sinches tight with the clip on straps that go under the front and rear. The side pleats fit over the side mirrors to help keep it in place. Zippered entry for driver's door helps if you need to get the car. The material is slippery enough that it hasn't harmed the paint. Lightweight. Mostly waterproof. The durability is it's only weakness. I've bought the same cover about once a year. A recent big wind shear came thru with 90 mph wind and tore it. But the value is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Jane

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy material
customer_reviews.text: Received this product and it was totally trashed. Several Huge Rips from front to Back. This is the 3rd time I have used Amazon Warehouse and every time the product was received defective. Shame on Amazon Warehouse! They DO NOT inspect products before they ship them to someone else as stated in the Amazon Warehouse description of products. The only good part is that I found that the material is so flimsy I don't want to have this particular car cover. Shame on Amazon Warehouse though!!!!
customer_reviews.author: margie beeson

customer_reviews.title: Not water proof
customer_reviews.text: When it rains the rain goes straight threw cover and makes the car dirty ugh very disappointed in this product....
customer_reviews.author: samuel e.

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today for indoors. I went C10 over correct size C9 in order to fit my long engined Jaguar xkr - Yes it bundles up at the rear. Lightweight, bright metallic look. Can’t beat the price for driver door zipper. Update: I ordered the smaller C9 in addition. It fits a 2010 335 perfectly. It never would have fit the xkr. Glad I read the reviews
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SUMMER CAR COVER..
customer_reviews.text: This is a great summer car cover. It's light weight and reflects the sun and rain. I use this car cover over a soft material cover because the other cover is not 100% water proof. My only complaint is the straps need to be secured better to the cover to help secure it when its windy. Use caution when placing on car due to the plastic strap connectors. NICE ZIPPER ON DRIVERS DOOR SIDE FOR ENTRY... Fits well on a 2010 528XI BMW....192" LONG. WILL PURCHASE AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: ~C

customer_reviews.title: Thin material. Ripped after 6 month
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on because material is very thin easy to manage, but UV quickly damaged the thin nylon fabric as if its just a plastic bag. Started tearing 4 month into usage which I managed to extent its life with some duct tape. Finally ripped beyond repairable condition in January. It was a poor investment in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Green eyes in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a full year
customer_reviews.text: It is water proof, however the sun made it rip easily. The sun made it brittle and ripped very easily. Do not recommend unless u plan to garage the car and don't want dust on it. Dissapointing, I was happy with the straps it had to secure to vehicle and the way the zipper opens on driver side door to be able to go inside.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it exactly 6 months ago and when it was alive, it worked beautifully. Then about 2 weeks ago, I notice a small tear and a few days later, the cover was completely dead! It ripped length wise completely in 2 pieces. So, because it worked (waterproof, dust proof and windproof and always stayed in place) I gave it a 2 star. But I guess we had too much wind and now I have it in 2 pieces. I'm not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bighi

customer_reviews.title: Three stars but only cause it it fits decent.
customer_reviews.text: Well i have to say that this product is not ment for outdoor covering at all. It is only one layer and its super thin. This car cover is only for dust. NOT All wheater. I cover my 2010 camaro and it hug it very well. It also came with clip so the wind wont blow it off.very light material. It came in a box as big as the cereal box.
customer_reviews.author: Victor M Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Fits my RX-8 great. My wife loves the looks
customer_reviews.text: Fits my RX-8 great. My wife loves the looks. Nice adjustable tie-downs I didn't know were built-in. And a zipper on the driver's side door. Light weight, and super slippery so no dirt gets caught in the material. Amazing design for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 2009 Prius perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: OK. Just received this car cover and it fit perfectly. The material seems very thin but appears sturdy. Only time will tell how durable this cover really is. No rain in the forecast so I will have to return with a better review of water resistance later. Zipper for driver door opening is convenient but the zipper was hard to pull up and down. I will try to lubricate it with some soap and hope it does the trick. Otherwise I will not use this feature for fear of tearing the cover.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold F.

customer_reviews.title: Kayme Car Cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this car cover last year for a car that I have outside. I would not purchase this car cover again nor refer anyone to buy one. While it looks nice, it's thin and tears easily. I would not call it "waterproof". When it rains, the car cover literally sticks to your automobile when it gets wet. It does not protect from the rain. I had it less than 6 months and ended up throwing it away because it tore from being wet and sticking to my car when I was trying to remove it. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my BMW E39 project car
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected and it fits my BMW E39 5 Series perfectly. No more dust or debris on my project car and whenever I need to take it off fully or even half way it is very light, easy to handle and compact. I was honestly not expecting it to be this compact and easy to use. Glad I bought it and for the price, you get more than what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: EmanuelSuzie

customer_reviews.title: nice cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to cover a 2000 firebird. It has a water leak somewhere and I am moving somewhere that it won't be covered. I have not had a chance to put in on the car yet, and I will update when I use it. delivered quickly and has a nice storage bag that matches the colors of my car (black with red letters).
customer_reviews.author: optimal

customer_reviews.title: Light, reflective cover with zippered door seemed like a bargain, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for one of my cars and was so impressed I bought another for a second car. The material was thin but seemed strong and heat reflective. The straps under each end held it on snugly and the zippered driver’s side door allowed interior access without having to remove the entire cover. And the sides were long enough to protect the wheels and tires, as well. However, six months have passed, and it just ripped from hood to rear hatch on the driver’s side after a day of light wind.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy D. Timmons

customer_reviews.title: 3 months in, already falling apart!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this car cover about 5 months ago and I’ve barely been using it for 3 months. It has now ripped in a couple of spots, at this rate it is going to just fall apart. I’m not sure if there is any warranty, I expected it to last at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: erika palacios

customer_reviews.title: Great Protection for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the C3 size for my 2020 Hynudai Kona Electric, and the cover fits like a glove. The material is thick enough to last for a while, and clearly resists dirt, sap, and rain, as I left it on in the rain intentionally to see how it would perform. I use this cover three days a week when I travel for work, and it is like having a portable garage for my car. I estimate it will last for about two years which, for the $36 I paid, works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: its about the most waterproof ive bought in 6 years
customer_reviews.text: it stays clean and reflects sun great--ive got 100 year old oak trees over my driveway and it did pretty good for 2 years of gitin beat up by aycorns from 30 foot up, but this fall, they sheded it like somebody with a switch blade knife,--not its fault at all-I just bought anothern so eye like um good luck, later
customer_reviews.author: johnny w

customer_reviews.title: Water proof yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this car cover for my 2004 Nissan 350z. It is truly waterproof! In my area we had two tornado type rains and since I took the cover off today and the car is as clean as the way I left it prior to the 2 major storms. Very impressed, excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L Waller

customer_reviews.title: It is not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It is useful if you don't want animals or bugs to ruin your clean car. But, it is not waterproof. The vehicle is going to get completely wet under the cover. At least it is light, and easy to use. But it is not good for exterior.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Started ripping - material too thin.
customer_reviews.text: Liked sun protection and weatherproof for two winters. Material strength and quality broke down after those 2 winters - ripped / tore in long strips. Given 2 stars because they lasted this long - came with 1 year returnable. Purchased 8 one of which is the thicker lined model still in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: R  Fife

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin! Plastic buckles are CHEAP that tighten up front and rear
customer_reviews.text: VERY THIN! Good as a temporary cover, I DO NOT THINK THIS WILL MAKE A GOOD LONG TIME COVER. It does fit nicely! And has zipper on drivers side door to gain entry if needed without taking cover off. Has Reflectors sewn into cover. The color looks similar to a MYLAR BALLOON. I’m going to try get pic 3 stars for the THINNESS, and cheap buckles. I would say that the price is definitely reflective of durability. It’s sewed VERY NICLEY, just thin!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A

customer_reviews.title: A decent for the money car cover.
customer_reviews.text: Let’s hope this one lasts longer than the one i bought six months ago. It indeed protects from the water. Liquids just slide right off. It still creates a filtration that goes onto the car though. The layer is very thing, Hhmm, maybe next Time I’ll get a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Selvin Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Thin Tore Fits Lexus ES350
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin. Zipper catches in fabric & strap stitching tore off cover after a few days. Tried to glue, then staple & finally saefty pinned the strap back on cover. Cover blew off & flew down street when back strap tore off in wind. This is a dust Cover! Not for weather & gets wrinkly. Fit is ok on Lexus ES350
customer_reviews.author: Sha' Ron Grace

customer_reviews.title: A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I own a '08 Chrysler Sebring convertible and is not driven during the winter months and I bought this cover to protect the vehicle from the winter elements. This cover has 2 built in straps,elastic at the bottom front & rear and 1 set of hasps in the center at the bottom where a bungee cord can be attached to keep the cover attached to the vehicle so it won't blow away in strong winds. A good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Surufka

customer_reviews.title: Great cover! Waterproof, windproof, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this car cover. It is totally waterproof, has a strap on the front and back that prevents the wind from blowing it off your car, and is also tall enough to cover my wheels. It's lightweight, and I can put it on by myself in just a couple of minutes. I love that it has the extra room for the side mirrors, and the measurements were accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah L

customer_reviews.title: Works but doesn't last very long.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This car cover does a very good job at keeping dust off my car. The straps also keep it in place when there is wind. Also, the zipper on the side is useful when you quickly want to get in the car for something. The major problem is that it lasted only about 4 months in the SoCal sun. The cover became too fragile in the sun and ripped easily . Its definitely not water proof either. One or two hours in the rain and your car will be soaked. I know this is a price friendly cover but I expected it to last at least 1 year. Will probably try out a different cover.
customer_reviews.author: FC

customer_reviews.title: Great budget cover
customer_reviews.text: Nothing very fancy with this cover. It does do the job. Soft lining underneath a silver (plastic?) exterior. Reflects sun well and does not seem to degrade with time. Strong wind will tear the tie down straps. For the money, it works well in Phoenix sun.
customer_reviews.author: K. Long

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought the C9. It fits perfectly for my Toyota Corolla. They have more options for your choice. Light weight, easy cover and easy to clean, hope the material is durable to last for a long time. It has light reflective panels in the front of the cover so people can see my car at night. It also has the straps at front and rear to tie to the wheels for preventing blowing off in heavy winds.
customer_reviews.author: Lan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Fits Station wagon
customer_reviews.text: 1999 Subaru Wagon Outback fits prefect . I guess I will update later to see how long it lasts. So after 2 weeks front locking clip broke . They sent me A knew one right away . Still A good cover .Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jet Boat Cracker

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but watch size when ordering
customer_reviews.text: Apparently I bought wrong size for my Lincoln MKS, but it did stop rain from getting in the car in the area I needed covered. I guess biggest thing is figuring out what size to order for your vehicle. I will be purchasing another, just have to figure out correct size for my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: I like it, a lot.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this car cover. For the cost, it's unbeatable. When the one I purchased wears out (everything does eventually), I will buy another. Very good quality, very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: endsng

customer_reviews.title: just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The driveway where I park my car is under a canopy of trees. This cover protects it from leaves, twigs, acorns, catkins, pollen, birds, etc., that otherwise would be all over the car. The fabric is lightweight, smooth, and nothing sticks to it. I use the car almost daily and the cover is easy to take off and put back on by myself - seldom fastening the straps, except in the case of high winds. I've used it for over six months now without any problems whatsoever. It's a perfect fit for my 2018 Honda Accord.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good as dust cover, 1-year durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Car Cover 13 months ago. The material is very thin, and it has become brittle. During the last 2 months, it has torn in a few places by the slightest of pulls (e.g., sliding it over the car’s mirror). Even before tearing, last Winter the car always got wet when it rained (FYI, I live in Central California where the weather is far from extreme). The Cover includes straps to secure it to the car, which is very nice. Plan on this Car Cover lasting you 1 year and serving mostly as a dust cover and Sun screen. 1 star for the affordable price, and 1 star for the straps.
customer_reviews.author: California Resident

customer_reviews.title: Not Reccomended for outside use.
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using this cover while being parked in a garage it good. But outside this cant handle mild weather. Rain goes thru it causing windows to spot. And sun/heat will cuase it to crack and crumble into dust.
customer_reviews.author: T-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this the day before yesterday and it arrived 30 minutes ago! It fits my 2012 Honda Civic Coupe wonderfully! I can't wait to see how it is when left ok outside! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Phee

customer_reviews.title: Don't waist your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is like a cheap rain coat that if you leave it out in the sun it'll become hard and any strong wins will reap it apart in different areas. At first I was hoping I got a good car cover since I bought several different ones but there is no hope to buy a car cover that will last at least for a year. I can't have a garage for my cars where I leave. Don't waist your money!!
customer_reviews.author: regular customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: This is the ordered and used for the same car since October 2018. The first on lasted until march using it every other week and leaving it on, not taking it off and on, it ripped almost as if it had too much sun damage. I bought the second one in April 2019 and June 9 (again only using every other week) after a windy rain storm the straps ripped off. Now I am in need of yet another car cover in 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: BlueCell

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made cover
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old and cheepest cover that fell apart into shreds. This cover is nice.. in terms of fit, and material quality. I like the integrated straps on both ends. The driver side zipper works, but is probably not too useful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Front Clip
customer_reviews.text: The cover is of great quality and I would like to give it 5 stars but it looks like I got a defective one and the clip for the front came broken already. I know I can purchase a better clip but that’s not the point, the item came broken and that shouldn’t happen. Update: they have sent me a msg and they were very helpful and kind, they’re helping me on getting my problem solved. -P.S. will update once I talk to the company that sent it
customer_reviews.author: Eunice

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof car cover does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof cover keeps the moisture out of my car, removing a prior problem with mildew. The clips and rings help hold it down in the wind, since it's on the large range of size for my car. I also like the separate wing mirror covers.
customer_reviews.author: GreensRGood

customer_reviews.title: Tighten your straps
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Put it on my car myself. I would recommend making sure your clips are secure and on properly. One of mine was broken. The cover flew away. A neighbor returned it to me. I replaced the broken clip and tightened them. Also used a stretchy bungee cord to make sure it stayed on the car. Totally a great purchase for a car that needs to be protected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on July 5th 2018, the day before a big rain storm. It fit well (not perfect, but that's okay) on my daughters 2010 Ford Focus, very easy to "install" and it held up great in the New Mexican wind and rain. She came home at Thanksgiving and the cover completely disintegrated when she took it off. I mean, it is what it is, I'd rather the sun ruin the cover instead of the paint... but I did expect a bit more than 4 months of use for $40. I won't be re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi M Ward

customer_reviews.title: I have nothing negative to say about this product!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I purchased this car cover above other car covers was the waterproof aspect, as well as the zipper. I am very pleased with how easy it is to put on and off; I have actually recommended this car cover to a neighbor. The only reason I didn’t Give it five stars on durability was that I have only had it two weeks, and I don’t really know yet how it will hold up over the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car cover for many kinds of cars. Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Toyota Corolla and this cover fits perfectly. It is exactly what I was looking for. Very light weight and so easy to install with one person. The side zipper makes it very convient to get something from the car. Love it. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Doris Negron

customer_reviews.title: It fits great and arrived undamaged at my door
customer_reviews.text: It fits great and arrived undamaged at my door. I don't like that water pools at the top of it instead of draining off, and when it is windy, the cover sometimes gets tangled inside the top rack of my SUV. Also, wish it had an opening for my car's antenna.
customer_reviews.author: bonniesdeals

customer_reviews.title: Moderate sun exposure causes splitting.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this cover only lasted 10months, sun exposure caused the material to become paper thin and literally split between seams. Cover was utilized for a 80’s Pontiac TA, parked outside in front of a house for sun exposure reference. The car only had an about 6-7hrs of direct sun daily. This cover would be better suited for indoor use. Otherwise the cover performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Williams

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem and quick replacement right away  thanks!!
customer_reviews.text: Car cover looks and protects the car well from dust rain quite well I had an issue with my original order where by it Lasted roughly 3months pretty much just dried out the fabric here in sunny SoCal and has multiple tears HOWEVER, KAYME was kind enough to replace my damaged one and replaced it Great Service THANKS !!
customer_reviews.author: BryMan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your time or MONEY
customer_reviews.text: terrible terrible terrible!!!! super cheap material do not waste your time!!! HUGE and very difficult to put on car!!! it tore within the same day of having it!!!! seriously save your time and money!!!! you can’t even return it because of how big it is it’s almost impossible to put back into the bag where it came in that goes in the box!!! DONT BUY SERIOUSLY
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Horrible pice of junk
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Corvette C 6, which is advertised - the cover will fit this make and model. Did not fit on the front end (short). Fabric is single layer vinyl which is adequate, but is stitched together with noticeable overlapping seams. Mirror pockets are not "real" mirror pockets, simply indentations for mirror placement. Purchased many other covers at this price point with complete satisfaction, not this one. Returning via Amazon. Recommend investigating other covers with a more custom fit.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey c. giles

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 6 months, now in tatters
customer_reviews.text: This was lightweight, fairly waterproof -- good to keep dust and bird droppings off. Really liked the feature of the zipper on the driver's side door. However, unless you want to buy a new car cover every six months, definitely not worth the money. The cover is in tatters, and has not been exposed to harsh elements.
customer_reviews.author: fylum

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage
customer_reviews.text: The cover covered over the most of the tires which was perfect because the rims were rusty and it was why I needed to cover it. It was a great fit and was a good quality. I would buy this again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried to unload a photo but it was too much of a hassle Suffice to say I really like this car cover, I Live in San Diego so I don’t care about snow or cold weather, just too much direct sunshine! The cover is easy to put on even for just me, unless it’s windy, then it becomes a real challenge! The price was reasonable as well!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This car cover is horrible, do not waste your money. It is extremely thin material and doesn’t fit my car as described. Waste of time and money as I unfortunately was traveling when it arrived and didnt unpackage until today.
customer_reviews.author: I & T

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thin one layer
customer_reviews.text: Very thin one layer cover. Using it over a fabric cover. May not hold up well on its own. Can't really say.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch, Wont last long.
customer_reviews.text: Okay for the price but it just started getting holes. Feels very cheaply made. Not even 3months and it's coming apart already.
customer_reviews.author: Epicmaster

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of measurement!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for Mercedes 2003 SLK 320. It's a little too big so the wind can get under it but I weighted it down. I didn't see a smaller one except special one for a Mercedes I think but price was "Mercedes Rediculous". WR
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Hyundai Kona EV
customer_reviews.text: After 5 tries I finally found the perfect fit for my daughter's Hyundai Kona EV... it fits like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: GEV

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Price is excellent. Product fits like a glove. It has Rained times and kept car dry each time. Very Easy to put on - takes about 1 min after you get it situated in the right direction..
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Howard

customer_reviews.title: Not a good outdoor car cover
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this cover if you plan to use it outside. After a season outside in New England, it permanently damaged my 1998 BMW M3’s paint! The paint now has hazy spots that cannot be removed by polish, compound or wet sanding. It appears that the summer heat damaged the clearcoat paint layer. I had a similar cover with a soft inner layer on this car and it didn’t damage the paint. It just wore out after a number of years.
customer_reviews.author: Warren R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very inexpensive and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with product. Pretty thin material so we will see how long it lasts. I’m not sure how good it would be outside. But in garage great cover.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fender

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep the water out
customer_reviews.text: Had this car cover for less than a mont and it is starting to deteriorate and it does not keep the rain out. I will be getting a better water resistant cover in the near future. You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: It actually takes a beating but is holding
customer_reviews.text: So far so good very durable I’ve seen some pretty strong winds and some thunderstorms since I’ve had it it blows up like a balloon but it stays intact.
customer_reviews.author: Roundone

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof, easy to put on and take off the car. Plus, the material is great 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with the cover. It's light weight and is not bulky. Easy to put on and take off. I order this Kayme car cover on Friday July 27. Received the car cover Sunday July 29. It definitely fix my car which is a 2011 Nissan Altima. Has a zipper on the size to get in the car. Was very inexpensive. It has a tie down strap in the front and back of the car. I do wish it had a strap in the middle as well but it's fine. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: This product lasted me a little over a year until it decided to tear. Product is light weight and easy to put on. The zipper on the driver’s side was useful and easy to get into the car without having to take the entire cover off. Sadly, it isn’t fully “water resistant” and some dust does get on the car on windy days when the cover lifts up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Cadenas

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This was the 2nd one of these that we bought. The first one lasted several months of relatively harsh gulf coast weather where we winter before it lost it's water repellant coating. Slightly disappointed that the new one is missing the D rings to secure it under the car in the center. But I cut out patches at the D rings from the old one and my sister-in-law sewed them onto the new one. Should do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T

customer_reviews.title: Poor Description, don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not what was described by any means, would return if I didn’t need something on my husband 83 Mazda rx7 . The material is the consistency of a tent.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Helps to keep my car clean from dust and other debris and strap buckles are a plus from strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product good if it didn't come broken
customer_reviews.text: Product would have been fine except the 2 snap buckles had a 'tine' broken, which means you ca't secure the straps. I didn't need to use it so didn't pull out until yesterday. 'Warranty' time is up so I can't replace/return.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: great cover, but a bit cumbersome to put on ...
customer_reviews.text: great cover, but a bit cumbersome to put on the car - trying to find which way is the front, etc. Love the fabric though and how light it is. Stays on when put on correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Delavega

customer_reviews.title: Wind damage
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product when I received it. I put on our car in Florida and when we came back , it took the paint off where the seam rubbed on the car. I assume it was from the wind moving the cover around. Will not put back on the car and just wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Monaca Leo

customer_reviews.title: Good cover.
customer_reviews.text: This thing blew all over the neighborhood because I was too lazy to buckle the straps. But it weathered that and every other abuse so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: fitment and durability
customer_reviews.text: Cover fit well, but apparently doesn't do well with wind due to it being so thin, bought it august 24th 2019 and it was almost torn in half by December 2nd 2019. almost 4 moths. wish they made it a little more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will not last in windy area
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last more than 6 months. Wind tore it in half. I would have given it fewer stars but the wind in rural north Texas is ridiculous so I can't totally fault this cover. If you live in a windy area buy something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Amarillo by morning

customer_reviews.title: Seems to save my paint.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it allows dust in. It feels like it may hold up, for how long I'm not sure. M
customer_reviews.author: Melinda J. Nino

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Very thin does not stay on the car well when he pulls it right up off the car
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: NICE FOR THE PRICE
customer_reviews.text: SO FAR IS WHAT IS ADVERTISED CANNOT COMMETON ALL OF IT HAVE NOT HAD IT LONG ENOUTHG
customer_reviews.author: Robert Trichel

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted 7months almost
customer_reviews.text: Worked for 6 months then tore it keeps tearing beyond repair!
customer_reviews.author: judy douglass

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, well made clever and light.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well made product for the price. The fabric is very lightweight and reflective. I modified by gluing some quarter size magnets to keep the cover in place while I secure straps and pull over the car.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Rider

customer_reviews.title: Not truly Rain/Water proof
customer_reviews.text: So I really liked the cover a first. The cover definitely helped keep the dust and leaves falling over my Honda Civic 2015 for a good month. However, one day it starts to rain and the next day I take the cover off and find my car all wet below. This specific cover is not rain/water proof as described.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos M

customer_reviews.title: This is a cheap cover, I knew it would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap cover, I knew it would be before I purchased it. But, I was just looking to use once-in-a-while and for the price this fit the bill. Fits tight on my '18 Camry.
customer_reviews.author: Onyasix

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different one.
customer_reviews.text: The straps tore off in first wind gust. Rain seeped in via the door seam. Very thin. Threw it away. Buy a better one and probably pay a little more.
customer_reviews.author: edward D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok.. wish the sides secured
customer_reviews.text: Ok for most part. The slides aren’t as secure. Blows up when windy
customer_reviews.author: Diva

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed terrible quality within 3 months a tear formed on the top
customer_reviews.text: Bought in July, went to remove it in August and it was sticking due to morning condensation which resulted in a tear/rip that I patched with duct tape. By November, multiple rips too many to duct tape. Don't use on a car staying outside, it won't last longer than 6 months and I live in Southern California so not even a freezing/snow.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: 2012 E350 Mercedes - great fit. Using for inside the garage - the black paint attracts every piece of dust. Like the reflectors. Wish the front or back was clearly marked.
customer_reviews.author: Asj reedre

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a year
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2006 Volkswagen Jetta. Worked for one whole year in the Southern California sun. After that, it got one small tear, wind happened, it split open down the entire cover and fell off my car in both sides like a loose shawl.
customer_reviews.author: Meiyee

product_meta.title: Kayme Car Covers for Automobiles Waterproof All Weather Sun Uv Rain Protection with Zipper Mirror Pocket Fit Sedan (182 to 193 Inch) 3XL
feature_bullets: 【Material】Single Layer Polyester Is Durable, Soft, Easy To Clean, Light Weight ( Easy To Put On And Off ), 1200MM Water Pressure ( Long-term Waterproof ).
【Feature】1) Driver Door Zipper For Easy Access. 2) Straps At Front & Rear To Protect Your Auto Cover Not Blown Away By Heavy Wind. 3) Reflective Stripe Warm The People In The Night. 4) Mirror Pocket.
【C9】 For Sedan, Car Length ( 182 To 193 inch ).
【HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE】1) Make Sure The Style Of Your Car, Sedan Hatchback or SUV. 5) According The Car Length To Choose.
【Model】C2 C3 C4 For Hatchback, C6 C7 C8 C9 C10 For Sedan, C11 C12 C13 For Suv Jeep.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars537 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
